SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Strategy

Class UserMovementStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Strategy.UserMovementStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
MovementStrategy
public class UserMovementStrategy extends Object implements MovementStrategy
Implements the MovementStrategy interface which defines movement behavior for user plane.

  • Method Details

    • getVelocityMultiplier

      public int getVelocityMultiplier()
      Gets current velocity multiplier which controls plane direction and movement speed.
      Returns:
      current velocity multiplier

    • moveUp

      public void moveUp()
      Sets plane movement direction to upwards by setting the velocity multiplier to -1

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown()
      Sets plane movement direction to downwards by setting the velocity multiplier to 1

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops plane movement by setting the velocity multiplier to 0

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates plane's position based on the current movement direction and speed. If plane exceeds the upper or lower bounds, the position is reset.

    • move

      public void move(FighterPlane plane)
      Moves FighterPlane by updating its position using movement strategy.

      Parameters:
      plane - : FighterPlane to be moved
